wikipedia_page.main: Hugh Campbell Rowley (March 1854 – after 1882) was an English rugby union footballer who played in the 1870s and 1880s. He played at representative level for England from 1879 to 1882, and at club level for Bowdon and Lymm Club, and Manchester Rugby Club, as a forward.

response: *Hugh Rowley, played nine times for England (from 1879 to 1882)
